Articles.Content:
What the title says.

I'm modding KSP to function like a fighter plane simulator. All is in place, but I've found that using the current controls is hard when aiming with a fixed gun.

Any help would be appreciated. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Analog Control [on this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116888-1-0-The-Plugin-Workshop-Small-plugins-of-varied-function) has that function. I use it and I greatly enjoy it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It's perfect! Thanks!

Rep for you man.
